data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Timiș who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Timiș, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Timiș to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 44,674 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 44,674 believers find a person of peace today among the 661,126 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Azerbaijani people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Timiș, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Timiș, Romania.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 661,126 lost in Timiș that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
